alert.note: Alert for Greene; Perry; Stone (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 30 at 9:50AM CST until December 30 at 10:45AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Mississippi, including the following counties, Greene, Perry and Stone. * WHEN...Until 100 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 950 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Wiggins, Richton, Perkinston, McHenry, Beaumont, New Augusta, Janice, Oak Grove, Barbara, Deep Creek, Whites Crossing, Bond, Ferguson, Wingate, Progress, Mahned, Belleville, Big Level, Little Creek and Hintonville.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
